title: Astronauts Lament
description: Navigate a hostile alien planet in this 2D platformer! Dodge asteroids, toxic gas, and a mysterious stranger. With 3 lives, jump moving platforms, survive meteor showers, and aim for the highest level you can achieve. Can you escape?
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Survive a Hostile Alien Planet in Astronaut’s Lament!
<!--text-->
**A Desperate Struggle for Survival**  
In *Astronaut’s Lament*, you’re a lone astronaut who has crash-landed on a mysterious alien planet. Your only goal: survive long enough to reach your ship and escape. But this unforgiving world is filled with dangers at every turn. Navigate treacherous terrain, dodge deadly asteroids, and avoid toxic gas clouds, threatening your every move. A mysterious stranger lurks in the shadows, ready to send you back to the start if you get too close. With only 3 lives, every jump counts in this thrilling 2D platformer.

**Challenging Gameplay**  
Test your skills across levels that increase in difficulty as you progress. Jump across moving platforms, survive meteor showers, and destroy asteroids with your sword to rack up a high score. The game’s grayscale art style, punctuated by the eerie glow of toxic gas, creates a haunting atmosphere, while 13 atmospheric tracks immerse you in the alien landscape. Track your progress with high scores for the highest level reached and asteroids destroyed, and challenge yourself to beat your best run.

**Key Features**  
- Dynamic platforming with moving platforms and environmental hazards.  
- Survive toxic gas clouds, meteor showers, and a mysterious stranger.  
- Grayscale art style with color-shifting toxic gas for a unique visual experience.  
- 13 atmospheric tracks to enhance the alien world’s mood.  
- Track high scores for levels reached and asteroids destroyed.  

Can you escape the lament of this hostile planet, or will you be stranded forever?
